nodes.text: Garreck Darkmere was a Human and the younger brother of Evram Darkmere.

Darkmere's mother was a pirate and when he was a child, she was killed during a conflict between the Daupherm Planet States and the Botor Enclave, so he entered the care of his older brother. However, two years later, Evram joined the Daupherm Merchant Fleet, so Garreck had to go and live in a Daupherm orphanage.
